description:
Maou the Great Stygian of Abe (Temp) is a demon and last boss of the game that Nagi is playing in episode 10.
She is cute, naive, and incredibly busty, and wears a talking skull named Gaikotsu on her head who punishes her when she tries to help the good guys.
She also appears on episode 50 of the first series as a host of the quiz game, and appears on the inner cover comic of Volume 13.
name: Maou
